trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"></xref> enables developers to improve rendering performance of non-WPF UIs that are hosted by WPF in interoperability scenarios.
Forces the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to be rendered.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"></xref> instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.
Forces the specified area of the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to be rendered.
The area of the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to be rendered.
If this parameter is null, the entire non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is rendered.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"></xref> instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.
